questions.question: Which of the following sentences is in the passive voice?
options: The meal was cooked by the chef.
The chef is cooking the meal.
questions.answer: The meal was cooked by the chef.

questions.question: Which sentence correctly uses a conditional structure?
options: If I had known, I would have helped you.
If I know, I would have helped you.
If I had know, I would helped you.
If I have known, I would help you.
questions.answer: If I had known, I would have helped you.
